title: Redeem Gift Certificate for a Tour
description: A customer wants to use a gift certificate to pay for a hot air balloon ride.

tasks.description: Check availability for the hot air balloon ride.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms availability on the desired date.

tasks.description: Validate the customer's gift certificate number and its balance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the gift certificate is valid and has sufficient funds to cover the tour.

tasks.description: Book the tour, applying the gift certificate as payment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully books the tour and redeems the gift certificate.
